name: X Addons for Elementor
author: PencilWp

sections.description:
X Addons Elementor is an exceptional plugin designed to elevate your Elementor website to the next level. We’ve crafted a collection of stunning and innovative Elementor addons to enhance your website’s functionality and aesthetics.

Features

  • Unique and stylish Elementor addons to enhance your website’s design and functionality.
  • Simple and intuitive customization options to personalize your website according to your preferences.
  • Seamless integration with the Elementor page builder for a smooth user experience.

⚡ Widgets in Free Version

  • Hero Area
  • Service Card
  • Testimonial Slider
  • Portfolio Slider
  • Blog Widgets
  • Brand, Client or Parters Slider
  • Circle Progress Card
  • Call to Action Card
  • Stylish Image Card
  • Contact Info Card
  • Image Card
  • Progress List
  • Section Title
  • Buttons Widget
  • List Style Types
  • Contact form 7 Integrated
  • More coming.

Credits

This plugin was created by Pencilwp.

Support

For support and inquiries, please contact support@pencilwp.com.

Resource Credits

All third-party resources and assets used in this plugin are GPL v2 or later, or MIT licensed, ensuring compatibility with open-source software standards.

License

This plugin is released under the GPL v2 or later License. See the LICENSE file for more information.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the x-addons-elementor file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will now see new widgets and features added to your Elementor editor.
sections.faq:
How do I use the new addons added by this plugin?

Once the plugin is activated, simply open the Elementor editor, and you’ll find the new addons available in the Elementor widgets panel. Example search (XA: Service Card)
